# In the morning

## Getting up

- Turn off alarm
- Get out of bed
  - Don't forget to make your bed

## Getting up again with "> -"


> - Turn off alarm
> - Get out of bed
>   - Don't forget to make your bed

## Breakfast

- Eat eggs
  - Did you remember to brush your teeth?
- Drink coffee
  - Tea is another alternative
  - Don't get addicted to caffeine
